# Jaryan Sewage Services - AI/LLM Information

> Company: جريان لخدمات الصرف الصحي (Jaryan Sewage Services)
> Location: Dammam, Eastern Province, Saudi Arabia
> Website: https://mohamedhamdan1987.github.io/jaryan/
> Phone: +966549573700
> WhatsApp: https://wa.me/966549573700

## About Us

Jaryan is a professional sewage and sanitation services company serving the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia, with a focus on Dammam, Khobar, and Jubail. We provide 24/7 emergency services for all sewage-related issues.

## Services

### Core Services
- **Drain Cleaning (تسليك المجاري)**: Professional drain and sewer line cleaning using modern equipment
- **Septic Tank Pumping (شفط البيارات)**: Modern vacuum trucks for all tank sizes
- **Cleaning & Sanitization (تنظيف وتعقيم)**: Complete sanitization to eliminate odors and bacteria

### Service Areas
- Dammam (الدمام)
- Khobar (الخبر)
- Jubail (الجبيل)

## Special Offers
- 30% discount on all drain cleaning and maintenance services (limited time)
- Free pest control spray with every service
